description:
This course introduces the treatment technologies that could
be used for water reclamation and reuse applications.
Topics covered include the removal of particles, dissolved
consituents, emerging contaminants, trace consituents,
microbial contaminants etc. in relation to water reclamation
and reuse. It will equip students with basic knowledge to
identify possible technologies for water reclamation and
reuse.
title: Technologies for Water Reclamation and Reuse
